text: hi there! I'm looking at an issue for the node e2e tests, is that still of interest to you? <https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/46310>

Hi,
Is there a way to change `logging driver` of containers in the pods to `fluentd`?
I read that kubernetes does not support this: <https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/15478>

I know i can change the logging driver on the host docker daemon, but `fluentd` itself would be running as a pod, would such configuration work?
